title: Glitch
body: I am having a problem where sometimes during where I am trying to match up in Lol The game randomling closes, it even caused me to get put in low priotry queue which I find annoying but I don't care about that I just want this to be fixed thanks for reading this :)

replies.body: When you enter queue and accept a match, the server picks up everyone and brings them together.  It sounds like you may be having a network issue that's causing you to not sync up and leave you behind.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to fix this up.  You should also test it out in custom games to prevent further penalties.  Hopefully, a connection tune up will get you back in game without incident!
